name: Epic Quest
description:
Epic Quest is a top down, arena based RPG. Do you have what it takes to make it to the top?

All music created by The Blake Robinson Synthetic Orchestra:

http://syntheticorchestra.com/
http://blake.so/bandcamp
http://youtube.com/SyntheticOrchestra

Controls

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Aim

Left Mouse Button - Swing Sword

Right Mouse Button - Use Shield

Space - Dodge Roll / Speak
